creditline: Gift of Gabriel P. and Yvonne M.L. Weisberg
description: train bridge with tunnel beneath, with train engine in ULQ; tall wooden picket fence at right with steep slope beneath; three round structures at top of image
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, Inscription, Edition and Stamp

on back, in pencil: [950039]
markings: LLC below image, in pencil: [7/30. (?)]; LRC, impressed in paper: [J. D. SAGOT / Evite / PARIS] (?)
signed: bottom center, in the print: [Ch. Heyman / 1913]; LRC below image, in pencil: [Ch. Heyman]; LLC at bottom edge of sheet, in pencil: [Un Pont boulevard Ney]
title: Un pont boulevard Ney
